name: Advanced Materials
effect: Increase the durability of the armor by +25% (round up).

name: Audio Suite
effect: Gain +3 Skill Levels on Vigilance checks when it's about hearing. The suite also allows you to filter sounds and set up an encrypted network of communication with others within 10km. Deactivates when the armor reaches 0 durability.

name: Battery Expansion
effect: Triples the duration of the power armor's battery.

name: Diamantine Mesh
effect: Adds +2 Soak against melee attacks and plasma projectiles.

name: Droppack
effect: Can be activated once to reduce the distance class of a fall by 10. After use, it requires at least 5 Minutes to recharge.

name: Emergency Systems
effect: The armor and its mods remain operable even when durability is 0.

name: Reflective Coating
effect: Negates the armor penetration of lasers.

name: Sealed
effect: The armor gains the Vacuum-Sealed quality and becomes usable in space by protecting against the dangers of vacuum, while providing life support for several hours.

name: Servos
effect: The user gains +2 Speed and a +1 pool bonus on melee and defense checks. Deactivates when the armor reaches 0 durability.

name: Shock Absorber
effect: Adds +2 Soak against explosions and falling damage.

name: State-of-the-Art
effect: Increase the durability of the armor by +50% (round up). Cannot be combined with the Advanced Materials.

name: Visual Enhancer
effect: Gain +3 Skill Levels on Vigilance checks when it's about seeing something. The suite also allows zooming, video recording and similar perks. Deactivates when the armor reaches 0 durability.
